Detailed Description

Servomotor function.

This function manages the servomotor of the POB-Servo board and the DUAL-POB servo device.

Code example:
        // init the servomotor device:

        InitServos( DUAL_POB );

        // move servomotor 0 to position 0:

        SetServo(0,0,1);

        Wait(100);

        // move servomotor 0 to position 255 (low speed)

        SetServo(0,255,1);

        Wait(100);

        // move servomotor 0 to position 0 (high speed)
        SetServo(0,0,7);


        // move multiple servomotors at the same time:

        UInt8 position[4];
        UInt8 speed[4];

        // init position and speed array....
        position[0] = 100;
        position[1] = 100;
        position[2] = 100;
        position[3] = 100;

        speed[0]=2;
        speed[1]=2;
        speed[2]=2;
        speed[3]=2;

        // set servos 2,3,4 and 5 with the position and speed array:

        SetServoArray(position, speed, 2, 4 );

Author:
Baptiste BURLES & Pierre SEGUIN. POB-Technology

Typedef Documentation

typedef enum _servo_device SERVO_DEVICE

Servomotor device enumeration.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum _servo_device

Servomotor device enumeration.

Enumerator:
POB_SERVO  select pob-servo board as servo device
DUAL_POB  select dual-pob servo board as servo device

Function Documentation

UInt8 GetServoPosition ( UInt8  servo  ) 

Get the current position of the servomotor.

This function works only for the POB-Servo. On Dual-pob, this function return 0.

Parameters:
servo servomotor number to get.
Returns:
the current position of the servomotor.

void InitServos ( SERVO_DEVICE  type  ) 

Init the servomotor device with the specified board.

Parameters:
type Type of servomotor device: POB_SERVO or DUAL_POB.

void SetGlobalSpeed ( UInt8  speed  ) 

Set speed for all servomotor.

Parameters:
speed speed for all servomotor (between 0 and 7).

UInt8  position,
UInt8  speed 
)

Set the position and speed of one servomotor.

Parameters:
servo : servo number to set
position : position of the servo
speed : speed of the servo : between 0 to 7.

void SetServoArray ( UInt8 *  position,
UInt8 *  speed,
UInt8  offset,
UInt8  len 
)

Set position and speed of multiple servomotor. 

        UInt8 position[4];
        UInt8 speed[4];

        // init position and speed array....
        position[0] = 0;
        position[1] = 0;
        position[2] = 0;
        position[3] = 0;

        speed[0]=1;
        speed[1]=1;
        speed[2]=1;
        speed[3]=1;

        // set servos 2,3,4 and 5 with the position and speed array:

        SetServoArray(position, speed, 2, 4 );

Parameters:
position Array of position
speed Array of speed
offset Id of the first servomotor to set.
len Lenght of position's array and speed's array.

UInt8  offset,
UInt8  len 
)

Set position of multiple servomotor. 

        UInt8 position[4];

        // init position array....
        position[0] = 100;
        position[1] = 100;
        position[2] = 100;
        position[3] = 100;

        // set servos 2,3,4 and 5 with the position array:

        SetServoArray(position, 2, 4 );

Parameters:
position Array of position
offset Id of the first servomotor to set.
len Lenght of position's array and speed's array.
